Reviews.Title: goooooiiiioood
Reviews.Author: hyeran lee
Reviews.Content: Very very Gooooooooooooooooodmore than gooooooogvery much goodcamera is smaller . gooduse easysimple boby is good

Reviews.Title: Terrific camera.
Reviews.Author: Ken Daraie "Ken"
Reviews.Content: It is refreshing to open a box and start using a product that meets or exceeds your expectations based on online research, reviews and ratings.  This camera did exactly that.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Zammit
Reviews.Content: Very Satisfied with this product. Functions well and product delivers as per its descriptions. Still have more to discover about it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: i used in my trip to paris and cancun, the pictures are great!! the capacity its perfect i still have space in my memory

Reviews.Title: Great bundle and great product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got this few weeks back, so haven't had the opportunity to check all of its features yet......so far so good, the camera is pretty good, size and how it feels, havent tested under water, night time shots are pretty decent as well. Value for money.

Reviews.Title: under water fun flic.
Reviews.Author: J.Rivera
Reviews.Content: Got my tx30 for a family fun carnival cruise  which We going to this august . I have tried it in the rain  and the pics look great.  Let's see what it do in the pool and beaches.  To be continued.
